definition: KOMURA Masahiko (1942-), Japanese politician, foreign minister from 1998, minister of defense from 2007
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Komura could not be sure the sound of his voice was even getting through to her.
sentences.chinese: 高村正彥也不能肯定他是否聽見了他沒。
